mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM PURCHASE ORDER BY 1

SELECT PURCHASE_NUM, U_ID, GAME_ID, BETMONEY, BETDRATE, ACCURACY, BETDATE, CHOISE FROM PURCHASE
WHERE U_ID = #{uId}
SELECT GAME_ID, COUNT(GAME_ID) AS gameCnt FROM PURCHASE GROUP BY GAME_ID ORDER BY GAME_ID

select game_id, sum(betmoney) as gameMoney, (select sum(betmoney*betdrate) from purchase a where returncheck = 'Y' AND a.GAME_ID = b.GAME_ID ) AS gameReturnMoney from purchase b group by game_id order by game_id
select choise, count(choise) as teamCnt from purchase group by choise
